titleStmt.title: The Lord Chancellors speech in the Exchequer to Baron Thurland at the taking of his oath, 24 Jan., 1672/3
titleStmt.author: Nottingham, Heneage Finch, Earl of, 1621-1682.

notesStmt.note: Written by Heneage Finch, Earl of Nottingham. Cf. BM.
